content: Is there a place in the spec that it says how searching history should work if history isnâ€™t written for a resource?
the spec says nothing at all about searching history except that the standard search doesn't search history
not clear what could be said about searching for history that has not been written.
Provenance resources might be recorded for past create/update? But if Provenance is not written, then it is not searchable either.
